name: HTTP to HTTPS link changer by Eyga.net
author: DSmidgy

sections.description:
When WP is opened through HTTPS, all local absolute links in content are replaced from HTTP to HTTPS.
Additional hosts can be specified through admin interface (like graph.facebook.com which works on HTTP and on HTTPS).
Options HOME and SITEURL shuld be changed to HTTPS when enabling this plugin.

short_description: When WP is opened through HTTPS, all local absolute links in content are replaced from HTTP to HTTPS.
